meanings: (아주 작음) the smallest, 극소하다 (be) smallest, minimum, infinitesimal

examples.korean: Renting or leasing equipment used in production is a tactic many firms use to maximize their cash flow and minimize their debt. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 생산시에 사용되는 장비를 임대하는 것은 많은 기업들이 자금 운용을 극대화하고 부채를 극소화하기 위해 사용하는 전략이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Renting or leasing equipment used in production is a tactic many firms use to maximize their cash flow and minimize their debt. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: While smaller nations do lack the power to take the lead themselves, when many nations expand together they can minimize balance of payments and other complications. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 작은 나라들은 스스로 앞장설 힘은 없지만, 많은 나라들이 함께 성장할 때 그들은 국제 수지와 다른 문제를 극소화 할 수 있다 YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: While smaller nations do lack the power to take the lead themselves, when many nations expand together they can minimize balance of payments and other complications. Add to Wordbook
